item.description:
Heal remaining pain you have in former and current relationships. Learn from your experience, be protective of yourself and learn what patterns you are still holding onto about former relationships. Look at how you think each gender "should be" and examine and change beliefs that hinder you. Take responsibility for your choices, let go and change into what will support you.


7 to 9:30pm

Cost $40, sliding scale to $20


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, has taught a number of workshops on relationship dynamics. He is a leading expert in the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), is a therapist for individuals, couples, and families who specializes in enhancing relationship satisfaction through understanding and better communication regarding personality differences. He does phone sessions and leads trainings for groups, organizations and companies.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Healing Relationship Pain - Past and Present
